docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: 主页

docs.text: 猫猫的偷懒小区域 [toc] 站点部署 静态同步 站点：http://127.0.0.1:8000 win+r cmd D: cd \ProgramData\venv\notes mkdocs serve push到GitHub mkdocs build ssh -T git@github.com mkdocs gh-deploy --force 相关语句 MKdocs基本语句 mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. pip相关 pip install mkdocs-material pip uninstall mkdocs-material 参考网站（想不起来就去看看吧 Markdown语法学习 大佬的MK笔记 Markdown语法教程 pip的基本指令 MKdocs构建 so easy！从头教你用mkdocs构建个人博客系统~ 主力文章 github部署 Github出不来换这篇 github SSh github SSh连不上 github pull github pull失败 MK个性化指南
